amendment.description: Amendment permits applicants to delay publication of applications until the later of (1) three months after a second PTO decision or (2) 18 months after the filing date.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-319 to eliminate provisions in the law permitting certain applicants to delay or prevent publication of their applications. The amendment would strike that provision and permit applicants to delay publication until the later of (1) three months after a second PTO decision or (2) 18 months after the filing date.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Issa.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
